titles.title: Covering Coronavirus Test Act of 2020

To amend title XXVII of the Public Health Service Act to require group health plans and health insurance issuers offering group or individual health insurance coverage to cover COVID-19 testing without cost sharing.
Covering Coronavirus Test Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Covering Coronavirus Test Act of 2020
This bill requires health insurance plans to cover diagnostic tests for COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) without imposing cost sharing.
